question: Domain Name
answer: Your first step towards digitalisation. Book and secure your unique, easy-to-remember domain name with Edneed, before anybody else does.

question: Subdomain
answer: Get a FREE Edneed subdomain with a domain. It will act like a mirror image of your website, if your domain is down for due to any technical reason.

question: Secure Website Hosting
answer: Your website will be securely hosted with Edneed's server.

question: Guard it with SSL
answer: SSL stands for Secured Sockets Layer. SSL certification helps your websites to keep their data secure, prevents them from attack and conveys a trust factor to the end users.

question: Website Builder
answer: A one-stop solution website builder with a live editor to create a phenomenal digital presence for your institute. No coding or developers needed.

question: Admission
answer: Tell your website visitors when admissions are open and accept applications through your website itself.

question: Vacancy
answer: Looking for teachers? Recruit via your website. Make positions open and accept applications.

question: Services
answer: Attract visitors by mentioning special services offered by our institute.

question: Announcements
answer: Keep the communication clear. Display notifications on your website easily.

question: Fee Structure
answer: Upload fee structure of special courses, trips or classes. Add payment methods.

question: Payment Method
answer: Add multiple payment method details such as; Cheque, UPI, PayPal and Bank Account.

question: Gallery
answer: Upload beautiful videos and pictures to your website. Create multiple albums to attract visitors.

question: Testimonial
answer: Put up positive experiences of your stakeholders on your website. It builds credibility in front of visitors.

question: WhatsApp Support Centre
answer: Always be available to answer customer queries with WhatsApp Support Centre.
